name: Aposyntheto's Link
body:
**Source** Alec Ellsworth and Advanced Player's Guide pg. 232 (Life Link)
-
Requirements Aposyntheto has a minimum of 32 Shard Points.
Range 30 feet; Targets self
Duration 1 minute
-
Effect Aposyntheto agrees to link his life force with your own to help ease your burdens of battle. You immediately heal for 3d4 Hit Points. The first time each round that you take damage, reduce the damage you take by 5 (to a minimum of 0 damage). Aposyntheto loses 5 Shard Points each time, or the total damage dealt, if less than 3; this damage ignores any immunities or resistances Aposyntheto might have and can't otherwise be mitigated in any way. 

This effect ends immediately upon falling unconscious. You can Dismiss the spell.
-
Level 13: 
- Increase the initial healing to 6d4 and the maximum damage reduced and Hit Points lost to 10. 

Level 17:
- Increase the initial healing to 9d4 and the maximum damage reduced and Hit Points lost to 15. 

Level 20: 
- Increase the initial healing to 12d4 and the maximum damage reduced and Hit Points lost to 20.
